channel.title: XaaS on Jim Shingler Blog
channel.description: Recent content in XaaS on Jim Shingler Blog

item.title: XaaS
item.description: I am trying something new. I am going write this blog post in the open. I will start writing my thoughts and ideas, and you will bw able to see and comment on the blog as it is developed. Your thoughts and questions will help me to improve the this post. Abstract Cloud offers a variety of solutions and approaches: IaaS, CaaS, PaaS, FaaS, and SaaS.
